summary: I TOOK MY 2010 CADILLAC SRX IN FOR AN INSPECTION TO RENRW MY REGISRTATION AND WAS TOLD THAT BE CAUSE OF THE ENGINE LIGHT BEING ON IT WAS AN AUTOMATIC FAIL.
